shortDescription: Get the name of a gamepad button for displaying to the user.
longDescription: Which is actually the user mapped key name with the first letter capitalized, or a representiative name for player 1 in mobile devices.

arguments.name: buttonID
arguments.description: The ID of the button [1-7]: 1: left, 2: right, 3: up, 4: down, 5: A, 6: B and 7: Start.

returns.name: name
returns.description: The name of the gamepad button.
